name: Grant Program to Establish a Fund for Financing Water and Wastewater Projects
objective: This program helps qualified nonprofits create revolving loan funds that can provide financing to extend and improve water and waste disposal systems in rural areas.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: Two awards were issued in FY23 for $858,001.

rules_regulations: 7 CFR 1783, Grant Program to Establish a Fund for Financing Water and Wastewater Projects (The Revolving Fund Program)
